snippet.title: I Made the PERFECT Pokemon Crystal Romhack
snippet.description:
Full Tutorial to Play on all Platforms: 
➤ https://youtu.be/kFLMFMMEcuc

Guide to the Romhack (ALL info): 
➤ https://docs.google.com/document/d/1nFzUWtrQm85oQlPp_cxL-b2-WB2Igs9E1PmJQ23SQwQ/edit?usp=sharing

Join the Discord:
➤https://discord.gg/Wupx8tHRVS

PC Links for Downloading/Playing the Rom:
➤ *NEW* 1.3.1 Patch File: https://github.com/cRz-Shadows/Pokemon_Crystal_Legacy/releases/latest
➤ Patching Software: https://www.romhacking.net/utilities/240/
➤ Online Patching Tool: https://www.marcrobledo.com/RomPatcher.js/
➤ Emulator: https://mgba.io/downloads.html

Mac Links for Downloading/Playing the Rom:
➤ *NEW* 1.2 Patch File: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1uFQCSsV2IjnvnNzRosmQyRcTo8wRPJh2
➤ Patching Software: https://www.romhacking.net/utilities/746
➤ Emulator: https://mgba.io/downloads.html

Full Tutorial on How to Play (same link at top)
➤ https://youtu.be/kFLMFMMEcuc

Follow My Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheSmithPlays
Following My Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thesmithplays/

Credits: Craig Livingstone (Production), Weebra (Editing), Josh (Discord),  Aero, Zach, Disq, Regi, Karlos, Nift, Tiberius, Sable, Ha1fisch, Dragon (Playtesters)

RARE CANDIES Code for Nuzlocking!
01209ED8
01999FD8

0:00 Intro
0:55 1: Gym Leaders
12:16 2: Trainer Levels
15:57 3: Pokemon Fixes
23:14 4: Team Rocket
29:57 5: Rival
34:30 6: Quality of Life
38:48 7: Elite Four
49:28 8: Kanto
58:40 - Update & How to Play
